speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the statement by the High Representative for the Common Foreign and Security Policy and the statement by the Commission on the situation in the Middle East following the elections in Israel.
original: President. The next item is the statement by the High Representative for the Common Foreign and Security Policy and the statement by the Commission on the situation in the Middle East following the elections in Israel.
agenda_item: Situation in the Middle East following the elections in Israel (debate)
